title: Comprehensive Security Assessment - Portfolio Application
description:
Conduct a full security assessment of the Portfolio application infrastructure,
including container security, infrastructure as code analysis, and web application
vulnerability testing. Focus on identifying critical vulnerabilities and
providing actionable remediation guidance.
business_context:
Portfolio application is a demonstration project showcasing DevSecOps capabilities.
This assessment will serve as a mentor demonstration of James-OS autonomous
security operations. Results will be used to validate the effectiveness of
AI-driven security consulting.
